amendment.description: Amendments en bloc No. 8, consisting of amendments numbered 56, 58, 59, 65, 69, 71, 76, and 78 printed in House Report 111-498.
amendment.purpose: An amendment comprised of the following amendments offered en bloc: amendments nos. 56, 58, 59, 65, 69, 71, 76, and 78 printed in House Report 111-498.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Skelton amendments (A020) Agreed to by voice vote.
